tha-ap395:10.2: puthupāsaṇḍanissitā → mūḷhā saccavinissiṭā (sya1ed, sya2ed); phutā saccavinissitā (pts-vp-pli1); phuṭṭhasaccavinissaṭā (mr)
tha-ap395:12.3: susamo santo → susīlo asamo santo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); paññavā yuttacāgo ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap395:14.1: Saṅgātigo → saṅgātīto (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṅghātīto (pts-vp-pli1) | hatamado → gatamado (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); tamanudo (mr)
tha-ap395:18.2: saddhammañcāpi vaṇṇayi → dhammañcāpi pakittayi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap395:24.4: Phuseyyuṁ → aññātañca vijāneyyaṁ passeyyaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); aññātañca vijāneyyaṁ phasseyyam (pts-vp-pli1); passeyya (mr)
